description:
Representing those injured through no fault of their own, we offer dedicated personal injury services at Anastopoulo Law Firm. We have office locations in North Charleston, South Carolina, as well as in Charleston, Columbia, Myrtle Beach, Florence and Greenville, allowing us to aid people living throughout the state. Our firm also has locations in Charlotte and Lumberton, North Carolina.

Having more than 25 years of legal experience, our law firm's founding attorney has dedicated his practice to pursuing the rights and interests of those injured due to the negligent or careless actions of others. We handle wide-ranging claims, including those involving the following:

  • Animal bites
  • Birth injuries and other medical malpractice claims
  • Motor vehicle and truck accidents
  • Premises liability
  • Product liability
  • Wrongful death

For people who suffer brain injuries or other such harm on the job, our law firm also provides workers' compensation services. We walk injured workers through the claims process, helping them obtain the benefits they need and deserve. Our firm offers free initial consultations.

At Anastopoulo Law Firm, we recognize the toll that accident injuries may have on people and their families - physical, emotional and financial. Offering compassionate, yet straightforward counsel, our attorneys advocate tirelessly on clients' behalf. We work to see those we represent made as close to financially whole as possible, so they can focus on what matters most - healing and moving forward.
